edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment.UserInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleUI, GraphicalUI

    public abstract class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    SuperClass used for Both UIs. Methods are what the GameEngine is expecting to use to command the UI

        Display Main Menu, and return chosen Option
        Returns:
        the Main Menu option selected by the user.

        Display help to the User

      • pickTurn

        public abstract int pickTurn(boolean canLook,
                             boolean canShoot)
        Present the Player with their options on their turn, and verify their syntax
        Parameters:
        canLook - if the Player has not yet looked
        canShoot - if the Player has ammo to shoot
        Returns:
        a verified integer corresponding to a action

      • printGameOver

        public abstract boolean printGameOver(boolean victorious)
        Print out a congratulations or game over screen
        Parameters:
        victorious - if the Player won, or AI won
        Returns:
        if the player wants to restart the game

      • printShotResult

        public abstract void printShotResult(boolean result)
        Print if the player shot a Ninja DEAD
        Parameters:
        result - if true, ninja was shot

      • querySaveFileName

        public abstract java.lang.String querySaveFileName()
        Ask User what to save name to this File as. Path is Locked
        Returns:
        the name user Request to Save the file As

        Parameters:

      • queryLoadFileName

        public abstract java.lang.String queryLoadFileName(java.lang.String[] saves)
        Get List of Every Save File in Directory, query user, for which they wish to use.
        Parameters:
        saves - Save Files found in Save Directory
        Returns:
        the file name

      • printDamaged

        public abstract void printDamaged()
        Print warning message that the player lost a life, and returned to 0,0

      • offerDifficulty

        public abstract boolean offerDifficulty()
        Print a query for the Difficulty to play the game at In Reality, define if the AI should be enabled
        Returns:
        the selected difficulty, where true means enable AI

      • queryDirection

        public abstract char queryDirection(java.lang.String actionType)
        Gets a Direction from the UI
        Parameters:
        actionType - What is the Direction entered in reference to
        Returns:
        The Direction the user specified, as a char of either n,s,w,e

      • printMap

        public abstract void printMap(java.lang.String[] map,
                              char lookDirection,
                              boolean debug,
                              boolean radarActive)
        Prints out a Map to the UI
        Parameters:
        map - the locations of all the entities
        lookDirection - 'f' if no looking done. n/s/e/w otherwise to represent the 4 directions
        debug - if Everything should just be revealed
        radarActive - if the suitcase should be shown

      • formatMap

        public char[][] formatMap(java.lang.String[] map,
                          char lookDirection,
                          boolean debug,
                          boolean radarActive)
        Formats the Game Board to show a single entity, and if that entity should be shown based on the parameters
        Parameters:
        map - the locations of all the entities
        lookDirection - 'f' if no looking done. n/s/e/w otherwise to represent the 4 directions
        debug - if Everything should just be revealed
        radarActive - if the suitcase should be shown
        Returns:
        a Matrix with each slot representing a character that should be shown by the UI

      • printRoomContents

        public abstract void printRoomContents(boolean briefcase)
        Show in UI if a the Spy found the Briefcase
        Parameters:
        briefcase - if game won

      • printPowerUp

        public abstract void printPowerUp(char item)
        Show in UI if which PowerUp was found
        Parameters:
        item - specific Item received
